{{html:
    <div class="row txt-center margin-vertical-small ng-cloak" ng-show="currentSpace.status != 'DEPLOYED'" ng-cloak>
       <div class="alert alert-warning margin-center-horizontal width-60">Unavailable until the first Virtual Machine is deployed</div>
    </div>
    <h1 ng-class="{opacity4: currentSpace.status != 'DEPLOYED'}">Defense Shield</h1>
    <p ng-class="{opacity4: currentSpace.status != 'DEPLOYED'}">The Defense Shield is your personal firewall that handles all incoming and outgoing traffic for your Cloud Space, your routing and firewall settings.</p>
<style>
.modal
{
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: -25% 0 0 -50%;
}
</style>
 	<div ng-controller="NetworkController">
 		<div>
 			<button class="btn" ng-click="showDefenseShield()" ng-disabled="currentSpace.status != 'DEPLOYED'">Advanced Shield configuration</button>
 		</div>
		<script type="text/ng-template" id="routerosDialog.html">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary ok" ng-click="cancel()">Close</button>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body width-full height-full" ng-bind-html="defenseshieldframe">
                </div>
        </script>

 	</div>
     <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/machineServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
     <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/Network/NetworkController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	   <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/NetworkServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
 }}
